item.title: Notes from "How to Read a Book: The Classic Guide to Intelligent Reading"
item.author: guosuiyu@gmail.com (mcsrainbow)
item.description: Four levels of reading: Elementary(Basic), Inspectional(Review), Analytical, and Syntopical(Subject).
